FAQ

SELECT A CATEGORY

  • Styles
  • Components
  • Others
  • Alignments

Q:How to create text styles?

  • First, select the heading you want to make as a text style. Next, click on the cube-like symbol next to the word "Text". Lastly, click add.
  • After clicking add, put the name for the style you want. Then create style.
  • After adding a text style, the name of the style should now be visible.

Q:How use text styles on actual project element?

  • Select an element, click the cube-like symbol next to Text, then choose the text style.
  • Final result.

Q:How to detach styles on an element?

  • Select the element you want to have its style detached. Then click the the detach button as the picture you see below.
  • Now, you can customize element properties freely again.

Q:How to create a component?

  • Create a design that you will use multiple times along the way. This time, a button is to be made. Draw a rectangle using the Frame Tool, then put a text inside the frame using Text Tool.
  • Click the frame then put border radius so that the frame will be rounded. Then click "Auto Layout" so the button will be responsive depending on the lenght of the word inside.
  • Rename the frame from "Frame 1" to "btn"
  • Click the btn, then click the "Create component". from "Frame 1" to "btn"
  • The button is now a component.

Q:How to use a component?

  • Go back to the canvas, then just click and drag the component you want to use.

Q:How to make a grid?

  • Select the frame, and go to the "Layout Grid".
  • Click the cube-like symbol, a pop-up window will appear, and select "Columns".
  • Set the the values stated on the picture.
  • Final result.
  • You can turn on/off the grid using (Ctrl + Shift + F4)

Q:How does "Align left" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align left" button.
  • Final result.

Q:How does "Align vertical centers" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align vertical centers" button.
  • Final result.

Q:How does "Align right" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align vertical centers" button.
  • Final result.

Q:How does "Align top" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align vertical centers" button.
  • Final result.

Q:How does "Align horizontal centers" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align vertical centers" button.
  • Final result.

Q:How does "Align bottom" work?

  • Select all the elements you want to use an alignment on. Then click the "Align vertical centers" button.
  • Final result.
